events.comment: Remember that ads are not visible in the previews run in GDevelop, only in the exported Android (or iOS) app. It may take a few days for the AdMob service to start providing ads in your application, especially for video content.

parameters: "Loading: " + VariableString(loading) + NewLine() + "Ready: " + VariableString(ready) + NewLine() + "Showing: " + VariableString(showing) + NewLine() + "Reward: " + VariableString(reward)
